Hi!

I've just seen this announcement on the NHK Shinsengumi! mailing list 
and thought that I should share the news.

Apparently, there will be a sequel to NHK Shinsengumi!, with the same 
cast. Kouji Yamamoto (Hijikata) would be the lead actor. The official 
announcement can be found at this addresse: 

http://headlines.yahoo.co.jp/hl?a=20050525-00000748-jij-soci

Unfortunately, translation softwares doing a very poor job, it is 
highly incomprehensible. I'm mostly relying on what people from the 
other mailing list are saying, so sorry for anything that wouldn't be 
accurate.

Mary-Ann
